chip: You could show Claude what good looks like
description: Provides examples of desired output to guide Claude toward a specific style, format, or quality. Surface when user asks for content in a specific style or format, wants output matching something they've seen, or has a vision they haven't fully articulated. Satisfied when user includes reference examples using phrases like: like this example, here's what I mean, something similar to, in this style, match this format, for example, here's one I like.
detail: Describing what you want is hard. Showing it is easy. Including an example—a sentence in the right tone, a snippet in the right format, a reference to match—gives Claude a target to aim for. One good example is worth a hundred words of description.
